tool_description: Creates customized volunteer application forms based on position requirements and organizational needs, with built-in validation and compliance fields.

background_check_required.description: Whether background check consent is needed

error_messages: Invalid reference count: Reference count must be between 0 and 5.
Empty position title: Position title cannot be empty.
Invalid required fields: Supported fields are personal_info, experience, availability, skills, motivation, emergency_contact.
Too many required fields: Maximum 10 required fields allowed.
usage: Specify the position title and required application fields. Optionally set background check requirements and reference count. The tool generates a customized application form.

form_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated form

form_url.description: URL where applicants can access the form

form_fields.description: List of all fields included in the form

estimated_completion_time.description: Estimated minutes to complete the form
